chuck.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to throw something in a careless or relaxed way
chuck.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Tania chucked her bag down on the sofa.
chuck something on/out of/into etc something
I chucked a few things into a suitcase and left.
chuck something on/out of/into etc something
Chuck me that pen, would you?
chuck.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to throw something away because you do not want it anymore
chuck.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I think I might have chucked it by mistake.

chuck.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: to end a romantic relationship with someone
chuck.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: part of a machine that holds something firmly so that it does not move
chuck.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a friendly word used to address someone in some parts of northern England
